author: contrastlife

comments.content:
Thank you Peter. That worked.   
Now, I have another problem maybe you can help with.   
   
The bowls of the face I am creating are filling in in the metircs window and at large printed sizes.   
   
What can I do here?

Choose all characters   
Elements -\> correct path direction   
   
That should do it
and don't forget to recalculate the bitmaps before generating

Thanks so much Peter.   
This site is really awesome! I am glad to be becoming a part of it. The critique on Verona was classic.   
I'll post my first face before too long and do my best to contribute where I can.   
Thanks again.
